title: 3 dead in shootings, standoff in West Central Laredo
content:
WARNING: This article contains photos and videos that some may find disturbing. LMT blurred the victims' faces.
Two girls died Monday afternoon in a shooting in West Central Laredo.
The girls, ages 6 and 16, were pronounced dead after emergency personnel took them to the hospital, LPD said. Their names have not been released.
Their killer, a man in his 60s, died in a shootout following a standoff with police in the 1800 block of Convent Avenue, LPD said. He has not been identified.
Read the full story in Tuesday's newspaper and e-edition.
